div.head: 萬病
div.div: the myriad of diseases; all diseases

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the myriad of diseases; all diseases

sense.def: Pathological Condition of “all diseases”, identical with bai bing 百病 , the one hundred diseases. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 1: 惟須向曉清靜時行氣 , 大佳 , 能愈萬病 , “All that is necessary is to move the qi at dawn at a clear and calm time. This is very good, and can cure the myriad of diseases ”.
